full_summary:
**Title and Dates**
===============

### Stage 2 - Lake Audy Road Crossing Replacements - Riding Mountain National Park

* **English Title**: Stage 2 - Lake Audy Road Crossing Replacements - Riding Mountain National Park
* **French Title**: Phase 2 - Remplacement des passages à niveau de la route du lac Audy – Parc national du Mont-Riding

### Tender Details
----------------

* **Tender Reference**: cb-5735-8769947
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0049/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-19
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, June 2, 2023, at 16:00:00 (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 14, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 16, 2023

### Licensing Requirements
------------------------

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: CNST

### Tender Context
----------------

The Parks Canada Agency requires the reconstruction of two Lake Audy Road crossings  over Jackfish Creek in Riding Mountain National Park, Manitoba. The work entails building corrugated plate arch structures with concrete footings on each side of the creek. The contract encompasses erosion protection measures to ensure continued water flow during construction and safeguard aquatic habitats.

The tender process is two-stage. Stage One evaluated the qualifications of interested suppliers, and Stage Two invites qualified suppliers to submit an Indigenous Benefits Plan and a financial bid. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

### Contact Information
---------------------

* **Contact Person**: Carmen Song
* **Email**: [carmen.song@pc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.song@pc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (604) 358-9479

### Tender Requirements
----------------------

The tender requires the submission of an Indigenous Benefits Plan and a financial bid in accordance with the specifications and drawings.

### Important Dates
----------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, June 2, 2023, at 16:00:00 (EDT)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 14, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: October 16, 2023
